contextId.information: Third is the ordinal number for three. AT: "after two days" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_ordinal]])
The word "eighth" is the ordinal number for eight. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_ordinal]])
The word "first" is the ordinal number for one. AT: "the goat for his own offering" (UDB) (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_ordinal]])
"Seventh" is the ordinal number for 7. AT: "7th day" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_ordinal]])
